@beep @MinaMarkham Seeing lots of suggestions for @GoHugoIO, @jekyllrb or other SSGs in this ample stream of replies... I'd offer that you can add a customisable CMS to any static site generator with @NetlifyCMS (which wrangles the content in your git repo) After years of decrying CMSs, I'm a fan
